post.body: psst. It's Mary Rose. :-) I use this acct. to connect with my Catholic buds and also, fellow conservatives. Glad you're here!
Cracker Barrel also rents audio books and allows you to return them to any CB. Came in handy when I drove from NC to OH. :-)
Fr., have you tried Ardour? Looks like it may have a bit more juice. http://bit.ly/3uPKkM
YW! You had some great words of wisdom and I'm always 'all ears' for that. :-)
Welcome to Twitter! It is addictive and yes, it can have value. Have fun with it. :-)
And btw, that photo I just posted was from Nov. 06. Yes. They've been firing at Israel for that long.
#TCOT Wow. So there ARE Israeli kids affected by the Gaza Strip rockets. Almost didn't think so from current photos. http://bit.ly/uUFT
I am so sleepy. Didn't get enough hours last night. Drinking coffee like mad.
Happy New Year! Here's a free beautiful Gregorian Chant mp3 for your enjoyment: http://bit.ly/yKmG
#TCOT For those trying to understand the Gaza Strip events. http://bit.ly/2Exq
#TCOT RNC rips into Bush for being 'socialist.' HOOwah! http://tinyurl.com/86s2yj
Up early this morning, and thinking about Twitter. It is rather funny how it brings out the high school in some of us.
#TCOT Tell me, anyone. Have you been blocked yet on Twitter? Thoughts?
What an interesting day.
#TCOT RT @MRMaguire: @davewiner Israeli-Palestinian events tricky. photgrphr is definitely biased. Many photos 'staged.' http://bit.ly/KRBp
I feel very good about 09. I think it's because of my new love for the Catholic church and my patron saint for 09 - St. Catherine of Siena.
#TCOT One of the funniest pieces @michellemalkin wrote re: Jihad Cindy. One has-been politician vs. top-notch Israeli force: EPIC FAIL
RT @michellemalkin: Looks like rough waters for Jihad Cindy McKinney and the S.S. Moonbat. http://tinyurl.com/aydgcc
My coughing from a cold woke me up at 1 AM and I wasn't able to get back to sleep. Awesome! (wry grin)
My response to a Nat'l Catholic Reporter writer who has gone agnostic: http://bit.ly/16zjg
